title: XYZ completes acquisition of French firm with €5B turnover
text: XYZ announced it has acquired a leading French company with annual turnover of 5 billion euros. Management said synergies will be immediate.

title: XYZ loses €1B contract to competitor
text: In a disappointing result, XYZ lost a major contract valued at approximately 1 billion euros to rival ABC.

title: XYZ reports faster-than-expected reservoir completion
text: The project finished in 9 months instead of 12, management highlights efficiency gains.
